title: DJI officially announces its sub-249 gram Mini 3 Pro
content:
The DJI Mini 3 Pro has been officially announced. The DJI Mini 3 Pro is a jack of all trades, pairing excellent imaging capabilities, compact footprint, with its weight coming in at less than 249 grams. This last detail is quite important, as it allows the drone to be flown in many regions and countries,

The post DJI officially announces its sub-249 gram Mini 3 Pro appeared first on XDA.
description: DJI has made its latest drone official after plenty of leaks. The DJI Mini 3 Pro comes in at under 249 grams.
